title: Habits of Recognition

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: You're not just leaving a trail of excuses. You're laying down habits of recognition that others use to decode you.
dialogue.context: Examining how identity becomes readable patterns

scene_context: The Architect, on its knees with a magnifying glass, investigates how we create recognizable patterns that others use to understand usâ€”each pattern a clue in the mystery of self.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
